bill_title: Honoring Tyler Sorenson of South Dakota State University for qualifying for the Division I NCAA National Wrestling Tournament in St. Louis, March 19-21, 2009.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Tyler Sorenson of South Dakota State University for qualifying for the Division I NCAA National Wrestling Tournament in St. Louis, March 19-21, 2009. WHEREAS, After missing the first half of the season due to injury, Tyler Sorenson has earned an outstanding record of 14-2 at the Division I level this year; and WHEREAS, Tyler Sorenson, wrestling at 197 pounds, has been ranked nationally for most of the season and most recently ranked fourteenth; and WHEREAS, Tyler Sorenson was able to win second place at the Western Regional by defeating Alfonso Hernandez of Wyoming. Winning that match by a score of 8-1, Tyler punched his ticket to the National Tournament: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-fourth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Tyler Sorenson, along with his team and coaches, be congratulated and wished the best at the Division I National Wrestling Tournament.

Winning that match by a score of 8-1, Tyler punched his ticket to the National Tournament: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-fourth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Tyler Sorenson, along with his team and coaches, be congratulated and wished the best at the Division I National Wrestling Tournament.
